mapper.select: SELECT B.intCondoID, B.intRoomID, B.intRateID, C.accomm_id AS accommId, RT.room_type_id AS strRoomTypeId, convert(varchar(10), B.checkInDate, 120) AS checkInDate, convert(varchar(10), B.checkOutDate, 120) AS checkOutDate, RP.strRatePlanId, RP.strMealCode, ISNULL(B.intPersonCount, RT.standpeopleCnt) AS intPersonCount, B.strRecvName, B.strRecvPhone, B.strRecvEmail, B.intRoomCount, B.strBookingProcess, B.strSpBookingId FROM test_Booking B WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN test_condo C WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.intCondoID = C.intCondoID LEFT JOIN test_room_type RT WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.intRoomID = RT.intRoomID LEFT JOIN test_rate_plan RP WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.intRateID = RP.intRateID WHERE B.intBookingID = ${intBookingID}
mapper.update: UPDATE test_Booking SET strBookingProcess = #{strBookingProcess} WHERE intBookingID = ${intBookingID}
